text.content:
Where Am I?

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 2}.

Bludgeoning

Surprise Opening

Crit Effect: You gain 1 action that you can use before the end of your turn to use an attack action against the target.

Piercing

Missing Ear

Normal damage. The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception check and Charisma-based check except Intimidation until healed.

Slashing

Mind Cloud

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} until healed.

Bomb or Spell
